fields.javadoc:
Delimiter used to denote sub-categories for specifying 
 a plugin's category.
fields.name: CATEGORY_DELIMITER
fields.comment:
Delimiter used to denote sub-categories for specifying 
 a plugin's category.

fields.javadoc:
Plugin descriptive name suffix used when a Plugin is still in 
 a "prototype" stage, where a test
 plan hasn't been fully written to thoroughly test the plugin's
 functionality to stamp it "released".
fields.name: PROTOTYPE
fields.comment:
Plugin descriptive name suffix used when a Plugin is still in 
 a "prototype" stage, where a test
 plan hasn't been fully written to thoroughly test the plugin's
 functionality to stamp it "released".

fields.javadoc:
Plugin descriptive name suffix used when a Plugin is still in
 "development" stage and needs more work to get to the "prototype"
 stage.
fields.name: DEVELOP
fields.comment:
Plugin descriptive name suffix used when a Plugin is still in
 "development" stage and needs more work to get to the "prototype"
 stage.

fields.javadoc: Default name for the default program tree
fields.name: DEFAULT_TREE_NAME
fields.comment: Default name for the default program tree

fields.javadoc: Wildcard char for a single char.
fields.name: ANYSINGLECHAR_WILDCARD_CHAR
fields.comment: Wildcard char for a single char.

fields.javadoc: Name of the Options object for Search.
fields.name: SEARCH_OPTION_NAME
fields.comment: Name of the Options object for Search.

fields.javadoc:
Option name for highlight color used when something to highlight is at the current
 address.
fields.name: SEARCH_HIGHLIGHT_CURRENT_COLOR_NAME
fields.comment:
Option name for highlight color used when something to highlight is at the current
 address.

fields.javadoc: Option name for whether to highlight search results.
fields.name: SEARCH_HIGHLIGHT_NAME
fields.comment: Option name for whether to highlight search results.

fields.javadoc:
Default highlight color used when something to highlight is at the current
 address.
fields.name: SEARCH_HIGHLIGHT_CURRENT_ADDR_COLOR
fields.comment:
Default highlight color used when something to highlight is at the current
 address.
